Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n4idcg25WD1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1frBRrJ"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/8adce6bde08051ffb397ac298baaec84/tumblr_inline_n4idr0Fefr1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>Based on the true story of <strong>PuffballsUnited</strong>'s first attempt at landing on the Mun, <a href="http://bit.ly/1frBRrJ"><strong>MUNAR 1</strong></a> is a charming take on a conversation between a Kerbonaut and mission control.</p>
I watched it multiple times it was so good.
Hadn't laughed like that for a while. That sums my first few landings up pretty well.
That's gold. So he's clearly watched me playing KSP then.
that was exactly like my first landings on mun although they were on the dark side of the mun but all resulted in failure
I suggest you don't post links from Newgrounds, there's some REALLY inappropriate stuff there and I have no tolerance for sites that host that sort of content.

I suggest you don't post links from Newgrounds, there's some REALLY inappropriate stuff there and I have no tolerance for sites that host that sort of content.

its a site for flash games and clips, its nothing like my beloved 4chan
This stuff is gold! Love how mission control is so calm...and Kevin!

Great video! Id love to see more like this in the future!

"awww yeah!!!"
I thought he would've bounced and lived

Haha. That exactly the attitude of my first Mun attempts too. I lost more Kerbals then than I have in the rest of my space program.

I thought he would've bounced and lived

Same. I guess we can be excused when we've got to know them as one hit point wonders. I regularly use a controlled bounce as a way to get a kerbal down a munar slope fast and easily.

I suggest you don't post links from Newgrounds, there's some REALLY inappropriate stuff there and I have no tolerance for sites that host that sort of content.

After a ringing *ahem* endorsement like that, I just had to take a look at the site.

Sadly it does not live up to the hype.
If he had just remembered how to use his jetpack, it might have been like my first semi-successful Mun landing. If you want to know the details, just give a holler.

LMFAO!

"(Sigh) Alright Kevin, you're up."

"AWW YEAH!"

Too much

This isn't so much like my FIRST Mun landing as my third, as the first two were a bit more... forceful.

Edited April 25, 2014 by Baythan
